duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing administrative duties such as preparing correspondence, making travel arrangements, and maintaining files.
Responding to inquiries in a professional, organized, and expedited manner.
Demonstrating a high level of customer service, professionalism, and confidentiality.
Producing accurate, properly formatted documents, memos, emails, and reports.
Maintaining a complex calendar and scheduling appointments, meetings, and calls.
Handling telephone calls, including screening incoming calls, mail, and packages.
Ensuring all assignments/projects are completed with accuracy and efficiency.
Establishing and maintaining effective professional business relationships.
